verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sin, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Cades. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Mary \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* same \w place|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* wanting \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* making \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sedition, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Would|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H1478"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w perished|strong="H1478"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* church \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w both|strong="H4191"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1165"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w you|strong="H0935"\w* \w made|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* wretched \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sowed, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* bringeth forth \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* leaving \w the|strong="H6440"\w* multitude, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* covenant, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ground, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* cried \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, hear \w the|strong="H6440"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* thy treasure, \w a|strong="H7200"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H3068"\w* living water, \w that|strong="H7200"\w* being satisfied, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* cease \w to|strong="H0413"\w* murmur. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w assemble|strong="H6950"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5869"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*. \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* thou hast \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1165"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* having \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* multitude \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w rebellious|strong="H4784"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* incredulous: \w Can|strong="H4994"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w twice|strong="H6471"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, there \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* abundance, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* people \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w their|strong="H8354"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1165"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w*,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w This|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* contradiction, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* strove \w with|strong="H0854"\w* words \w against|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mean \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* Cades \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: Thou knowest \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* labour \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w come|strong="H4672"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*:

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* what manner \w our|strong="H0001"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* afflicted \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H0001"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w an|strong="H7971"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. \w Lo|strong="H2009"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Cades, \w which|strong="H1366"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* uttermost \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* leave \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w country|strong="H0776"\w*. \w We|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w wells|strong="H0875"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w common|strong="H0776"\w* \w highway|strong="H1870"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w turning|strong="H5186"\w* \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* past thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w if|strong="H6435"\w* thou dost \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* armed \w against|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* beaten \w way|strong="H1697"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w*: \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* difficulty \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w price|strong="H4377"\w*, \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* speedily.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* immediately \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* infinite multitude, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*,

Neither \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* condescend \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* desire \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* passage \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*. Wherefore \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* another \w way|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w removed|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* camp \w from|strong="H5265"\w* Cades, \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w which|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* borders \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Edom:
\w Where|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, saith \w he|strong="H0834"\w*, \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* incredulous \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w*, \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* contradiction.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H2022"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*:
